description: <p>We offer an integrated health and social care to the people of Alderney and Guernsey. Our Neonatal Unit has 3 cots and is based on one hospital site and in addition to attending deliveries and assisting the medical team our staff undertake air transfers.<br /><br /> We are seeking Neonatal Nurses with a drive to consistently improve standards of nursing and develop their skills to pursue a career in our Neonatal Unit. To support our commitment to revalidation we provide a comprehensive training programme to our staff which includes yearly off-island placements to maintain skills as well as the payment for the cost of NMC subscriptions.</p>
title: Senior Neonatal Staff Nurse (Band 6)
